EmailTemplate.description: Email template for notification that application has been received and payment has failed Privacy Shield participation.
EmailTemplate.name: PS: Payment Failure/Application Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Payment Failure - Privacy Shield Certification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Payment__c.OwnerFirstName} {!Payment__c.OwnerLastName},
Thank you for attempting to self-certify your organization’s adherence to the Privacy Shield Principles. The Privacy Shield team has received your organization’s self-certification submission, but the attempt to submit payment has failed. The Privacy Shield self-certification for {!Payment__c.Participant__c} has not been finalized. Please login and resubmit payment through the original application process. https://www.privacyshield.gov/welcome
Questions
If your organization has any questions concerning Privacy Shield or the self-certification process, please contact the ITA’s Privacy Shield team via the Privacy Shield website, whenever possible, at https://www.privacyshield.gov/assistance or by phone at 202-482-1512.
